Template.TextPart:
Hello {{name}},

Your Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) code is {{otp_code}}.

Please enter this code to proceed with your login. This code is valid for 10 minutes.

If you did not request this code, please contact our support team immediately at support@beatstake.com.

Thank you,
BeatStake Inc
